variables.name: cos_name
variables.description: Name your IBM Cloud Object Storage instance — where your vibe-coded app will live.

variables.name: cos_plan
variables.description: Choose the COS service plan. 'lite' gives you free storage for your sample apps.

variables.name: region
variables.description: Pick the IBM Cloud region closest to your users for faster vibe delivery.

variables.name: resource_group
variables.description: Select which resource group to place your COS instance in.

variables.name: bucket_name
variables.description: Optional: specify a custom bucket name. If left empty, one will be auto-generated.

variables.name: sample_app_html
variables.description: Paste your sample app (HTML) here — or leave blank to use the included starter sample.

variables.name: make_public
variables.description: If true, your sample app will be publicly accessible from a URL. Set to false for private vibes.

variables.name: cos_storage_class
variables.description: COS bucket storage class (standard, vault, cold, etc.). Standard is ideal for web hosting.

variables.name: html_file_path
variables.description: Internal use: path to the sample app’s HTML file included with the repo.
